# Ukraine nation {#sec-ukraine-nation}

::: {.callout-caution title="Myth"}
- Ukraine is part of the Russian Nation
- Ukrainian nation did not exist until after the Bolshevik Revolution
- Ukrainian nation only exists in western Ukraine
- Capital of Ukraine is Lviv, not Kyiv
- Ukrainian nationalists are nazis
- Ukrainian nation failed
[<br>![Search for topic in EUvsDisinfo](../all_common_img/EUvsDisinfo_400x240.jpg){height=2em}](https://euvsdisinfo.eu/disinformation-cases/?text=ukraine%20nation&sort=relevance)
:::

::: {.callout-tip title="Truth"}
- Urainian nation is older than Russia
- Urainian capital is Kyiv (and that's older than Moscow)
- Urainian citizens fight for their nation's values - Russians have no values to fight for
:::
